content: SeedlyTV EP05 REITs The Fifth Person Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 15 May 2019What criteria do you think is most important when assessing a REIT? Would it be the sponsor?1 answerAnswerBump0

Ashley Wong, Financial Assistant at Multi Management & Future SolutionsLevel 4. ProdigyUpdated on 16 May 2019NAV is a good metric to use when analyzing REITs but it is only as good as the analyst completing the assessment of each individual who possess the REIT. The calculation of the market value of assets must be done carefully in order to reach at an accurate NAV for the entire REIT.0 comments0
